document.full_text: the combination of two experimental pills developed by glaxosmithkline plc has shown promise as a treatment for melanoma, the most deadly type of skin cancer, according to new research.
document.title: targeted drug combo shows promise against melanoma
lines_and_colors: the combination of two experimental pills developed by glaxosmithkline plc has shown promise as a treatment for melanoma, the most deadly type of skin cancer, according to new research.
